# cato_private_app (Resource)

The `cato_private_app` resource contains the configuration parameters necessary to manage a private apps.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `allow_icmp_protocol` (Boolean) Is ICMP enabled?
- `internal_app_address` (String) The local address of the application
- `name` (String) The unique name of the private App
- `probing_enabled` (Boolean) Is probing is enabled?
- `published` (Boolean) Is the private app published?

### Optional

- `connector_group_name` (String) Connector group name
- `description` (String) Optional description of the private App
- `private_app_probing` (Attributes) Private app probing settings (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--private_app_probing))
- `protocol_ports` (Attributes Set) List ports and protocols (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--protocol_ports))
- `published_app_domain` (Attributes) Domain information about the published private app (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--published_app_domain))

### Read-Only

- `creation_time` (String) Creation time
- `id` (String) The unique ID of the Private App

<a id="nestedatt--private_app_probing"></a>
### Nested Schema for `private_app_probing`

Required:

- `fault_threshold_down` (Number) Fault threshold
- `interval` (Number) Probing interval
- `type` (String) Probing type

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Probing ID


<a id="nestedatt--protocol_ports"></a>
### Nested Schema for `protocol_ports`

Required:

- `protocol` (String) Protocol; e.g.: TCP, UDP, ICMP

Optional:

- `port_range` (Attributes) Port range (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--protocol_ports--port_range))
- `ports` (Set of Number) List of TCP or UDP ports

<a id="nestedatt--protocol_ports--port_range"></a>
### Nested Schema for `protocol_ports.port_range`

Required:

- `from` (Number) From
- `to` (Number) To



<a id="nestedatt--published_app_domain"></a>
### Nested Schema for `published_app_domain`

Required:

- `connector_group_name` (String) Connector group name
- `published_app_domain` (String) Published app domain

Read-Only:

- `creation_time` (String) Creation time
- `id` (String) ID of the private app domain
